answers.author: Corey Orlosky
answers.text:
ICMA’s Center for Performance Measurement™ has a comprehensive comparative performance measurement program that focuses on 18 local government service areas, one of which is Information Technology.  CPM also operates what we refer to as the Arizona Performance Consortium, which enjoys good participation from active and vocal members such as Phoenix, Mesa, and Scottsdale.  More information on our consortia can be found here: http://icma.org/en/results/center_for_performance_measurement/participants/consortia.  Any of these cities can provide more information, and as the CPM staffer in with responsibility for the IT service area, I can also answer any questions Tempe may have on our performance measurement system.
Corey Orlosky
Management Associate
ICMA Center for Performance Measurement
202-962-3693
corlosky@icma.org
